QuestData.Title: Changing the Wind's Course
QuestData.Description: At last, we have all that we need to right the wrongs of the North Wind and its followers. You have attuned the Lorehammer to Stormhoof's time and his persona.$B$BTake the hammer again, head to the Temple of Life in the plains to the northwest. Use the hammer to assume the role of Stormhoof. Face the North Wind as Stormhoof, but realize that for the timeline to be restored, Stormhoof must die as the North Wind weakens.$B$BThen, you must find and use the Horn of Elemental Fury to destroy the North Wind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Lorehammer to travel back in time and face the North Wind as Stormhoof. When Stormhoof falls and drops the Horn of Elemental Fury, use it to finish off the North Wind, and then return to Xarantaur at Camp Tunka'lo.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you done it? Is the true timeline restored?
QuestData.RewardText: What you have done today will ensure that Stormhoof and his story will never be forgotten. As well, you have written yourself into the pages of Azeroth's history. I will remember and record your accomplishments for all eternity.
